show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: and Dr Z
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Christopher Ochner PhD. Dr. <!--more--> Ochner is a leading researcher on nutrition and the brain at Mount Sinai School of Medicine and the New YorkObesityNutritionResearchCenter.
Along with Harvard-trained neurologist Richard Isaacson MD , an associate professor of clinical neurology specializing in Alzheimer’s disease at University of Miami Miller School of Medicine, Dr Ochner coauthored  The Alzheimer’s Diet: A Step-by-Step Nutritional Approach for Memory Loss Prevention and Treatment.
Learn more at www.TheADplan.com/alzheimersdiet.htm orhttp://www.alzheimersdiet.
com/.
